column4: my system freeze completely when using any libtorrent (rasterbar or the other one) based clients (rtorrent or deluge), there is no log entry or error, I have to do hard reboot to get back in the system. other clients dont have any problems ?!?!
I use Vuze, formally Azureus with no issues; it's a little 'heavy' though.
I refuse to use anything java
